sentences.sentence: Perioperative stroke did not significantly decrease 5-year survival.
sentences.translation: 术中的中风不会明显降低5年生存率。

sentences.sentence: No perioperative bleeding or airway swelling was noted in any patient.
sentences.translation: 没有任何患者在围手术期观察到出血或者呼吸道肿胀。

sentences.sentence: Objective To summarize the experience of perioperative surgical treatment of heart myxoma.
sentences.translation: 目的总结心脏黏液瘤围手术期的外科治疗经验。
